name: Screwball
overview: Screwball has 60 seconds to changes the color of all the squares on the screen by hopping between them. The player is menaced by the Black Bugs, which chase the player around the maze, and cost the player a life if caught. Screwball can dig holes in the maze to drop bugs through, and if surrounded can hyperspace to the top of the screen, although, this can cost a life. When all squares change color, the player advances to the next level.
